body: i'm thankful, even if much of our time together is spent crammed into the cramped backseat of a car on an endless freeway in between destinations we don't really care about visiting, to get to spend time with d and d's sister e. i'm thankful that we passed a lot of the drive time giving each other internet quizzes and laughed a lot. i'm thankful for the moment when we were listening to "kill v. maim" by grimes and they sang together in close harmony.
normalized_markdown: i'm thankful, even if much of our time together is spent crammed into the cramped backseat of a car on an endless freeway in between destinations we don't really care about visiting, to get to spend time with d and d's sister e. i'm thankful that we passed a lot of the drive time giving each other internet quizzes and laughed a lot. i'm thankful for the moment when we were listening to "kill v. maim" by grimes and they sang together in close harmony.
